description: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

double_jeopardy.clue_text: (Video of Sarah in Toledo, Spain.) Windmills, like this one, inspired perhaps the most famous scene in all this writer's work

title: Show #4443 - Wednesday, December 24, 2003
